title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.226 - Operating expenses
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.226 - Operating expenses

State Regulations

Operating expenses include all necessary and proper costs
which are appropriate in developing and maintaining the operation of the
patient care facilities and activities. Necessary and proper costs related to
patient care are those costs which are common and accepted occurrences in the
hospital operation. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
441.226

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
